participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and sociable, enjoys sharing stories from his past.
participant_1.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: Nostalgic and vibrant, loves to reminisce about childhood and enjoys music.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop.
